<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grievous Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=6366) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 206 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=255)

**Prerequisites**
[Martial Artist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6364)

</column>

---

You know how to deliver focused, powerful blows that bypass your enemies’ resistances. Make an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=719) melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306). If this Strike hits, it deals two additional weapon damage dice and ignores an amount of [resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2318) to physical damage (or to a specific physical damage type) equal to your level. This Strike counts as two attacks when calculating your [multiple attack penalty](/Rules.aspx?ID=2289).

If you are at least 18th level, increase the additional damage to three weapon damage dice.
name: Grievous Blow
